original_text: Why do you have to watch me, God, like a guard? Do you think that I am a dangerous monster from the sea? Why do you have to watch me, God, like a guard?
korean_text: 내가 바다니이까 바다 괴물이니이까 주께서 어찌하여 나를 지키시나이까

sentences.original_text: Why do you have to watch me, God, like a guard?
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님, 당신은 어째서 파수꾼처럼 나를 지켜보아야 합니까?

sentences.original_text: Do you think that I am a dangerous monster from the sea?
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내가 바다에서 온 위험한 괴물이라고 생각합니까?

sentences.original_text: Why do you have to watch me, God, like a guard?
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님, 당신은 어째서 파수꾼처럼 나를 지켜보아야 합니까?
